entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-131}{F813,1,414203}So this is that Shibuya place{F801}everyone's talking about, huh?{F801}Pretty lively...{F801}{F802}The people here used to think this{F801}place was the birthplace of new{F801}trends, right?{F801}{F802}All right, then. entry.source: {F812}Talkative man\0{F87A,79}{F813,1,403421}It looks like Club Milton's been{F801}reopened. ...Does that mean someone's{F801}defeated that demon?{F801}{F802}Some Ashura-kai guy once told me that{F801}the place was taken over by a demon{F801}who wanted to take all the Reds...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Talkative man\0{F87A,79}{F813,1,403421}I was talking with some Ashura-kai{F801}dudes about that Koga Saburo.{F801}He's some evil dude, isn't he?{F801}{F802}He tried to keep all the Reds for{F801}himself, right? We don't need{F801}selfish people like that in Tokyo!{F801}
